::DarkMouse/KitKat::

DarkMouse::
She sat back in her chair in frustration.  With only a few bots to 
guard the base, sending out the welcome wagon was not looking like a 
good idea. She sighed with a heavy spark.  "I'm not a commander.  I'm 
no leader.  I need a commander here who can do this." She said under 
her breath.
She turned and looked about.  She needed every able bot here to 
defend the base.  She knew that there wasn't much choice.  She could 
send Terrorsaur, but he would be needed here in case of trouble.  
KitKat was out. THat was it. She opened her link to the wolf.
"KITKAT, I need you here at the base now."

KitKat::
"I'm busy."

DarkMouse::
"NOW! We can look for Rowdy later. I need you here now!"

KitKat:: 
She was getting annoyed by the pushy mouse.
"I'll return soon."

DarkMouse::
"That's an order. Get back here now!"

KitKat::
"Oh and who died and made you leader?" in her most sarcastic voice.

DarkMouse::
"I'll report you if you don't get back here right now."

KitKat::
"OK, I'll be right there."
She left the cave and headed back to the base.  She had been hit with 
Megatron's stun gun once. And that was enough.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> "I've already begun landing proceedures, Thank you for your 
> assistance Darkmouse." The spider said sarcastically.
> 
> "Computer open the artilary crates." Phobia was weary that 
Darkmouse 
> hadn't given him a number of bots to expect. He left the pilots 
chair 
> and proceeded back to the cargo hold.
> 
> "These should do." he said to himself as he drew two Decimator 
rifles 
> from a crate. If the Predacons tried anything they'd be in for a 
rude 
> surprise.
>
